My New List
===========

- You can go to :doc:`hello`
- You can go to :doc:`bye`
- You can go to :doc:`../details`

This is a simple paragraph, you can go to :ref:`coding_section`
or :ref:`Sec <subsubsec>`.
you can also the :ref:`coding_sec` code.
You may see :ref:`this code <console_t>`.

You can download
:download:`this <../dls/sphinx.pdf>` file.

You can go to :ref:`complex_code`.

you can go to :ref:`coding_sec`.
